meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of fish or fishing.
meanings.sent1: The piscatorial hobbyist enjoyed spending time by the lake, hoping for a big catch.
meanings.sent2: The piscatorial equipment store sold fishing rods, bait, and nets.
meanings.sent3: The piscatorial expert could always tell when a fish was about to bite.
meanings.sent4: Her piscatorial knowledge was as deep as the ocean itself.
meanings.sent5: The piscatorial scent of the sea filled the air, inviting all to join in the hunt for fish.

meanings.sent1: The piscatorial patiently waited for the fish to take the bait.
meanings.sent2: The local piscatorial was known for his impressive collection of fishing trophies.
meanings.sent3: The young piscatorial was thrilled to catch his first fish all by himself.
meanings.sent4: She admired the skill of the old piscatorial who could catch fish with just a line and hook.
meanings.sent5: The piscatorial's love for fishing was evident in the stories he shared with anyone who would listen.
